Add, remove, and move the navigation links. To access the setup area of a navlink, click the corresponding item in the navlink list. ClickAdd linkto add a link Clickto remove a link (last link cannot be removed).
Align the navlinks in the navbar.
Enable "hamburger" menu on mobile devices, displaying menu links one over another.
Align the hamburger menu icon horizontally (left, centeror right). This property is only available if the hamburger menu is enabled.
Clickto update the hamburger menu icon color. This property is only available if the hamburger menu is enabled.
html:
Property

Function

Breadcrumb navigation (1)

Use "breadcrumbs" at the top of the setup area to navigate the parent (column, section, banner, block and template) elements.

Navbar constructor

Add, remove, and move the navigation links. To access the setup area of a navlink, click the corresponding item in the navlink list. Click Add link to add a link Click to remove a link (last link cannot be removed).

Align

Align the navlinks in the navbar.

Hamburger menu

Enable "hamburger" menu on mobile devices, displaying menu links one over another.

Icon align

Align the hamburger menu icon horizontally (left , center  or right ). This property is only available if the hamburger menu is enabled.

Icon color

Click to update the hamburger menu icon color. This property is only available if the hamburger menu is enabled.
